The_DT middle_JJ stump_NN placed_VBN dead_JJ center_NN of_IN the_DT bowling_NN crease_NN and_CC perpendicular_JJ to_TO the_DT bowling_NN crease_NN ._.

This_DT word_NN has_VBZ originated_VBN from_IN the_DT Umpires_NNP saying_VBG the_DT word_NN ``_`` over_IN ''_'' at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN six_CD balls_NNS ._.
One_CD bowler_NN can_MD not_RB throw_VB two_CD overs_NNS simultaneously_RB &#44;_CD one_CD bowler_NN can_MD bowl_VB many_JJ overs_NNS without_IN changing_VBG his_PRP$ end_NN ._.
Batsman_NNP can_MD not_RB change_VB their_PRP$ side_NN &#44;_CD hence_RB the_DT batsman_NN who_WP was_VBD non_JJ striker_NN become_VBN striker_NN and_CC the_DT striker_NN now_RB become_VBP non_JJ striker_NN ._.

In_IN each_DT team_NN there_RB should_MD be_VB a_DT wicket_NN keeper_NN because_IN this_DT is_VBZ an_DT important_JJ position_NN to_TO field_NN ._.

The_DT one_CD doing_VBG both_DT batting_NN and_CC wicket_NN keeping_VBG is_VBZ called_VBN as_IN ``_`` wicket_NN keeper\/batsman_NN ''_'' &#44;_CD sometimes_RB he_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN as_RB all-rounder_JJ &#44;_CD Actually_RB all-rounder_NN are_VBP very_RB rare_JJ as_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT players_NNS concentrates_VBZ only_RB on_IN either_DT batting_NN or_CC bowling_NN ._.
Every_DT eleven_NN players_NNS should_MD field_VB and_CC one_CD among_IN them_PRP is_VBZ wicket_JJ keeper_NN ._.
The_DT position_NN of_IN this_DT fielder_NN is_VBZ just_RB behind_IN the_DT wicket_NN of_IN the_DT striker_NN batsman_NN ._.
The_DT main_JJ duty_NN of_IN the_DT wicket_NN keeper_NN is_VBZ to_TO catch_VB the_DT balls_NNS which_WDT are_VBP not_RB hit_VBN by_IN the_DT batsman_NN and_CC to_TO stop_VB the_DT batsman_NN from_IN taking_VBG runs_NNS ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ bound_VBN to_TO wear_VB hand_NN gloves_NNS and_CC pads_NNS as_IN he_PRP is_VBZ standing_VBG just_RB behind_IN the_DT batsman_NN -LRB-_-LRB- only_RB wicket_NN keeper_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO wear_VB these_DT -RRB-_-RRB- He_PRP can_MD catch_VB the_DT ball_NN which_WDT have_VBP just_RB touched_VBN the_DT bat_NN and_CC he_PRP can_MD stump_NN out_IN the_DT batsman_NN ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ player_NN who_WP can_MD stump_NN out_IN the_DT batsman_NN ._.
The_DT position_NN is_VBZ not_RB decided_VBN but_CC the_DT particular_JJ position_NN sometimes_RB known_VBN by_IN good_JJ names_NNS like_IN slip_NN &#44;_CD third_JJ man_NN &#44;_CD silly_JJ mid_NN on_IN and_CC long_JJ leg_NN is_VBZ always_RB insecure_JJ positions_NNS ._.
The_DT Captain_NNP is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS important_JJ member_NN of_IN the_DT team_NN because_IN he_PRP makes_VBZ tactical_JJ decisions_NNS such_JJ as_IN determining_VBG rotation_NN of_IN bowlers_NNS ;_: is_VBZ responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT placement_NN of_IN fielders_NNS ._.

One_CD takes_VBZ station_NN at_IN the_DT striker_NN &#39;_CD s_VBZ end_NN to_TO defend_VB the_DT wicket_NN and_CC to_TO score_VB runs_NNS if_IN possible_JJ ._.

Different_JJ varieties_NNS of_IN shots_NNS are_VBP played_VBN in_IN cricket_NN ._.

In_IN 1937_CD &#44;_CD China_NNP and_CC Japan_NNP were_VBD fighting_VBG in_IN Marco_NNP Polo_NNP ._.
Soviet_NNP Union_NNP gave_VBD full_JJ support_NN to_TO China_NNP &#44;_CD but_CC Japan_NNP started_VBD defeating_VBG the_DT Chinese_JJ army_NN in_IN Shanghai_NNP &#44;_CD and_CC captured_VBN its_PRP$ capital_NN Beijing_NNP ._.
In_IN 1938_CD China_NNP flooded_VBD the_DT Yellow_NNP river_NN and_CC China_NNP gained_VBD some_DT time_NN to_TO manage_VB the_DT situation_NN &#44;_CD even_RB then_RB could_MD not_RB stop_VB Japan_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT meantime_NN &#44;_CD war_NN started_VBD between_IN USSR_NNP and_CC Japan_NNP and_CC they_PRP were_VBD busy_JJ on_IN their_PRP$ borders_NNS ._.

In_IN 1576_CD Akbar_NNP sent_VBD a_DT very_RB large_JJ contingent_NN of_IN pilgrims_NNS led_VBN by_IN Yahya_NNP Saleh_NNP &#44;_CD including_VBG members_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ harem_NN &#44;_CD on_IN Hajj_NNP ._.
From_IN 1577_CD to_TO 1580_CD four_CD more_JJR groups_NNS left_VBD for_IN Hajj_NNP with_IN whom_WP presents_VBZ for_IN people_NNS of_IN Mecca_NNP and_CC Medina_NNP and_CC gifts_NNS for_IN poor_JJ people_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT year_NN 1584_CD &#44;_CD Akbar_NNP &#44;_CD along_IN with_IN the_DT Portuguese_NNP &#44;_CD planned_VBD to_TO attack_VB the_DT port_NN of_IN Adan_NNP in_IN the_DT kingdom_NN of_IN Yemen_NNP ._.

Akbar_NNP was_VBD a_DT Muslim_NNP &#44;_CD but_CC respected_VBD other_JJ religions_NNS and_CC etchnic_JJ groups_NNS ._.
Akbar_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP interest_NN in_IN religion_NN increased_VBD as_IN he_PRP grew_VBD old_JJ ._.

Moreover_RB &#44;_CD Akbar_NNP appointed_VBN Hindu_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP on_IN different_JJ authoritative_JJ posts_NNS which_WDT was_VBD never_RB done_VBN by_IN a_DT Muslim_NNP ruler_NN before_IN in_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN India_NNP ._.
He_PRP understood_VBD the_DT fact_NN that_IN to_TO stay_VB in_IN India_NNP for_IN a_DT longer_RBR duration_NN &#44;_CD he_PRP must_MD treat_VB the_DT natives_NNS of_IN the_DT land_NN equally_RB and_CC must_MD position_VB them_PRP equal_JJ to_TO the_DT Muslims_NNPS ._.
Akbar_NNP with_IN Christian_NNP Jesuits_NNPS in_IN the_DT prayer_NN place_NN -_: 1605_CD AD_NNP Jizya_NNP tax_NN was_VBD only_RB imposed_VBN on_IN Hindus_NNP so_IN that_IN they_PRP were_VBD forced_VBN to_TO accept_VB Islam_NNP due_JJ to_TO compellation_VB out_IN of_IN poverty_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB imposed_VBN on_IN Muslim_NNP people_NNS ._.
Because_IN of_IN this_DT tax_NN &#44;_CD a_DT lot_NN of_IN poor_JJ Hindus_NNP had_VBD to_TO undergo_VB monetary_JJ problems_NNS &#44;_CD which_WDT left_VBD them_PRP with_IN no_DT option_NN but_CC to_TO join_VB Islam_NNP ._.
Firoz_NNP Shah_NNP Tughlaq_NNP has_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN how_WRB Islam_NNP had_VBD spread_VBN due_RB to_TO implementation_NN of_IN Jizya_NNP ._.
Akbar_NNP had_VBD forced_VBN several_JJ Hindus_NNP to_TO convert_VB to_TO Islam_NNP against_IN their_PRP$ will_NN ._.

In_IN Akbar_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP rule_NN &#44;_CD one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ ministers_NNS &#44;_CD Hussein_NNP Khan_NNP Tukriya_NNP forced_VBD Hindus_NNP to_TO wear_VB badges_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ shoulders_NNS and_CC arms_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN discrimination_NN ._.
According_VBG to_TO the_DT historian_NN &#44;_CD Dashrath_NNP Sharma_NNP &#44;_CD we_PRP think_VBP Akbar_NNP as_IN a_DT great_JJ ruler_NN because_IN of_IN the_DT desciptions_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ courts_NNS in_IN the_DT Akbarnama_NNP ._.
But_CC if_IN we_PRP consider_VBP his_PRP$ other_JJ achievements_NNS &#44;_CD then_RB we_PRP can_MD understand_VB his_PRP$ wrong_JJ behavior_NN and_CC attitude_NN towards_IN the_DT higher_JJR Hindus_NNP ._.
The_DT reason_NN was_VBD evident_JJ -_: There_EX was_VBD a_DT marriage_NN alliance_NN between_IN the_DT family_NN of_IN King_NNP Mansingh_NNP and_CC Akbar_NNP ._.
Hindus_NNP can_MD not_RB built_VBN temples_NNS without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN Akbar_NNP King_NNP Mansingh_NNP began_VBD construction_NN of_IN a_DT temple_NN in_IN West_NNP Bengal_NNP without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN Akbar_NNP ._.
When_WRB Akbar_NNP found_VBD out_IN &#44;_CD he_PRP stopped_VBD the_DT construction_NN and_CC ordered_VBD it_PRP to_TO be_VB reconstructed_VBN as_IN a_DT mosque_NN in_IN 1595_CD ._.

Ganga_NNP along_IN with_IN all_DT its_PRP$ tributaries_NNS is_VBZ an_DT evergreen_JJ source_NN of_IN irrigation_NN for_IN a_DT large_JJ area_NN ._.

Such_JJ a_DT hypothesis_NN is_VBZ proposed_VBN in_IN different_JJ forms_NNS of_IN the_DT heat_NN may_MD be_VB the_DT result_NN of_IN solar_JJ activity_NN As_IN a_DT consequence_NN of_IN the_DT slow_JJ response_NN to_TO the_DT thermal_JJ inertia_NN of_IN the_DT thermal_JJ inertia_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ oceans_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN and_CC other_JJ invisible_JJ influences_NNS &#44;_VBP the_DT present_JJ temperature_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN is_VBZ not_RB in_IN balance_NN with_IN the_DT pressure_NN put_VBD on_IN it_PRP ._.

The_DT monthly_JJ CO2_NNP measure_NN shows_VBZ that_IN there_EX are_VBP small_JJ changes_NNS in_IN the_DT climate_NN in_IN the_DT entire_JJ year_NN ._.
Every_DT year_NN these_DT changes_NNS in_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Hemisphere_NNP increases_VBZ at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN and_CC decreases_VBZ during_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN seed_NN plantation_NN as_IN plants_NNS absorb_VBP some_DT CO_NNP @_SYM from_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN ._.

One_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS apparent_JJ retort_NN is_VBZ related_VBN to_TO evaporation_NN of_IN water_NN ._.

Because_IN water_NN vapor_NN itself_PRP is_VBZ a_DT green_JJ house_NN gas_NN &#44;_CD the_DT atmosphere_NN become_VB more_RBR hot_JJ &#44;_CD and_CC this_DT leads_VBZ to_TO further_JJ evaporation_NN of_IN water_NN -LRB-_-LRB- positive_JJ feedback_NN -RRB-_-RRB- &#44;_CD and_CC this_DT reaction_NN continue_VBP on_IN till_IN positive_JJ feedback_NN is_VBZ not_RB checked_VBN ._.

The_DT type_NN and_CC height_NN of_IN the_DT clouds_NNS in_IN this_DT layer_NN will_MD affect_VB the_DT temperatures_NNS below_IN this_DT layer_NN ._.

As_IN we_PRP go_VBP up_RP in_IN the_DT troposphere_NN the_DT temperature_NN gets_VBZ reduced_VBN ._.

In_IN this_DT way_NN &#44;_CD the_DT green_JJ house_NN effect_NN depends_VBZ on_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN decrease_NN of_IN temperature_NN with_IN the_DT height_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT temperature_NN decrease_NN rate_NN is_VBZ less_RBR green_JJ house_NN effect_NN is_VBZ less_JJR and_CC vice_NN versa_RB ._.
Theories_NNS and_CC models_NNS both_DT indicate_VBP that_IN due_JJ to_TO the_DT worming_JJ effect_NN &#44;_CD the_DT decrease_NN in_IN temperature_NN as_IN we_PRP go_VBP up_RP is_VBZ reduced_VBN ._.

Calculation_NN of_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN change_NN of_IN temperature_NN with_IN height_NN is_VBZ very_RB subtle_JJ and_CC sensitive_JJ to_TO tiny_JJ changes_NNS &#44;_CD and_CC so_RB it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO find_VB out_RP whether_IN the_DT model_NN represents_VBZ the_DT reality_NN or_CC not_RB ._.
Another_DT important_JJ process_NN is_VBZ the_DT Ice_NNP Albedo_NNP Reversal_NNP ._.
When_WRB the_DT temperatures_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN rise_NN &#44;_CD ice_NN caps_NNS at_IN the_DT poles_NNS start_VBP to_TO melt_VB ._.
Compared_VBN to_TO ice_NN &#44;_CD land_NN and_CC water_NN are_VBP not_RB easily_RB convertable_JJ and_CC therefore_RB can_MD absorb_VB sun_NN rays_NNS easily_RB ._.
This_DT results_NNS in_IN more_JJR heat_NN and_CC as_IN a_DT consequence_NN more_RBR ice_NN gets_VBZ melted_VBN and_CC this_DT cycle_NN continues_VBZ ._.
Positive_JJ feedback_NN which_WDT happens_VBZ because_IN of_IN emission_NN of_IN CO2_NNP and_CC CH4_NNP is_VBZ another_DT reason_NN for_IN warming_NN ._.
These_DT gases_NNS arise_VBP from_IN permafrost_JJ from_IN Siberian_JJ marshes_NNS ._.

some_DT papers_NNS suggest_VBP that_IN very_RB less_JJR research_NN has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN on_IN this_DT ._.

A_DT video_NN film_NN by_IN the_DT Canada_NNP Broadcasting_NNP Corp._NNP In_IN 1898_CD &#44;_CD Sarojini_NNP Naidu_NNP became_VBD the_DT life-partner_NN of_IN Dr._NNP Govindarajulu_NNP Naidu_NNP ._.

Types_NNS of_IN pollution_NN are_VBP listed_VBN below_IN with_IN the_DT related_JJ pollutants_NNS Air_NNP pollution_NN &#44;_CD presence_NN of_IN chemicals_NNS and_CC pollutants_NNS in_IN air_NN ._.
From_IN motor_NN vehicles_NNS and_CC industry_NN :_: carbon_NN monoxide_NN &#44;_CD chlorofluorocarbon_NN and_CC nitrogen_NN oxide_NN are_VBP common_JJ pollutants_NNS ._.
Photochemical_NNP ozone_NN and_CC smog_NN are_VBP formed_VBN by_IN a_DT process_NN involving_VBG nitrogen_NN oxide_NN &#44;_CD hydrocarbon_NN and_CC sunlight_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN rivers_NNS and_CC groundwater_NN runoff_NN system_NN &#44;_CD wastewater_NN and_CC pollution_NN containing_VBG water_NN are_VBP responsible_JJ for_IN water_NN pollution_NN ._.
Soil_NN contamination_NN happens_VBZ when_WRB chemicals_NNS mix_VBP with_IN soil_NN during_IN sprays_NNS and_CC underground_JJ chemical_NN reactions_NNS ._.
Most_RBS important_JJ among_IN soil_NN contaminant_NN are_VBP heavy_JJ metals_NNS &#44;_CD hydrocarbons_NNS &#44;_CD MTBE_NNP &#44;_CD herbicides_NNS &#44;_CD pesticides_NNS and_CC chlorinated_VBN hydrocarbons_NNS ._.
Noise_NN pollution_NN includes_VBZ roadway_NN noise_NN &#44;_CD aircraft_NN noise_NN &#44;_CD industrial_JJ noise_NN and_CC high_JJ frequency_NN sonar_NN ._.

On_IN 23_CD August_NNP &#44;_CD 1945_CD &#44;_CD Japan_NNP announced_VBD that_IN Netaji_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP aircraft_NN has_VBZ crashed_VBN in_IN the_DT outskirts_NNS of_IN Taiwan_NNP and_CC due_JJ to_TO this_DT Netaji_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN seriously_RB injured_JJ and_CC later_JJ declared_VBD dead_JJ in_IN a_DT hospital_NN Netaji_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP assistant_JJ Colonal_NNP Habibur_NNP Raheman_NNP also_RB was_VBD accompanying_VBG him_PRP in_IN that_DT aircraft_NN After_IN the_DT incident_NN &#44;_CD the_DT Netajis_NNP Bones_NNPS were_VBD kept_VBN in_IN a_DT Budha_NNP temple_NN named_VBN Ranekozi_NNP in_IN Tokyo_NNP After_IN the_DT independence_NN &#44;_CD Indian_NNP goverment_NN ordered_VBD enquiry_NN on_IN this_DT incident_NN twice_RB on_IN 1956_CD and_CC 1977_CD Both_DT the_DT times_NNS it_PRP was_VBD concluded_VBN that_IN Netaji_NNP had_VBD died_VBN in_IN that_DT air_NN crash_NN ._.
But_CC these_DT committee_NN members_NNS did_VBD not_RB have_VB any_DT talks_NNS with_IN government_NN of_IN Taiwan_NNP where_WRB the_DT accident_NN had_VBD occured_VBN ._.

What_WP is_VBZ the_DT majority_NN required_VBN This_DT is_VBZ a_DT Bill_NNP which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB a_DT Constitutional_NNP amendment_NN &#44;_CD Money_NN or_CC Finance_NNP Bill_NNP ._.

The_DT cases_NNS are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: 1_LS ._.
To_TO impose_VB &#44;_CD remove_VB or_CC control_VB any_DT tax_NN 2_CD ._.

These_DT type_NN of_IN petitions_NNS are_VBP born_VBN in_IN America_NNP and_CC they_PRP are_VBP known_VBN as_IN petitions_NNS of_IN public_JJ interest_NN and_CC there_EX are_VBP courts_NNS and_CC justices_NNS assigned_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ._.

1_LS ._.
